mapper.insert: insert into cart(BID,DID,num,time,price,SID) values (#{BID},#{DID},1,now(),(select Dprice from supply where DrugID=#{DID} and SID=#{SID}),#{SID})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where BID=#{BID} and DID=#{DID} and SID=#{SID};
mapper.update: update cart set num=num+1 where BID=#{BID} and DID=#{DID} and SID=#{SID}
update cart set num=num-1 where BID=#{BID} and DID=#{DID} and SID=#{SID};
